author: Alvaro Romero
comment: Please, could anybody tell me how to kill the app in my watch, because the only way to close the app in my LG G watch is rebooting. Thanks
title: Help

comment: Love the simplicity of the list and the idea, but to be effective on Android Wear, the list needs to stay active.  On Moto 360, it keeps timing out, so you have to reactivate the app by swiping up, then swiping left, then pressing "Open" to see the list. I have reported to developers. But for now,  it's easier to just use your phone.
title: Needs to stay active

author: Sukhjit Rai
comment: Good but can't rearrange list items.
title: Rearrange list

author: Max Cosentino
comment: I usually don't write reviews, but had to for this one. It is perfect. No more having to take out my phone, check my list, put phone away, get some groceries,  take out phone, check list again, etc, etc...I can't wait to see what else it can do. Adding items from my watch would be the bomb...hint...hint
title: Awsome

author: Charles Seagraves
comment: Works really smoothly. I would give 5 stars if the font could be made smaller on the watch. That would allow more description to appear. If it's possible to add ability to add items to list on watch with voice it would be a 10. Look forward to future updates.
title: Best Wear list app bar none

author: Chris Carella
comment: This app is off to a good start. Developers are responsive and keep making improvements.
